name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Saffron Pasta with Walnut Sauce
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on pasta. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons Olive oil for the pasta
6 ounces Olive oil for the sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer 3 pinches Saffron in water and set aside 30 minutes. Combine with Semolina flour, olive oil, and salt.
Knead well and set aside 15 minutes. Knead again. Break into suitable pieces and run it through a pasta machine (dust with flour to prevent sticking).
